title: License process - Business rules
content:
The license workflow relies on a few simple business rules. Rules repeat from one phase to another when the end user can make a change to a field affected by a business rule during that phase.

All processes

In the out-of-the-box license workflow, the rules detailed for each of the following events apply to all processes.

Rendering

Condition Service Management actions
Phase isn't Ended Close code = hidden
If Perpetual = true
  • Start date = hidden
  • End date = hidden
If Acquisition type is Rental or Lease or Loan
  • Total amount = hidden
  • Currency = hidden
  • Tax rate = hidden
  • Payment terms = hidden
  • Payment date = hidden
  • External PO Number = hidden
  • Invoice number = hidden
  • Fixed assets section (in Finance tab) = hidden
None

Show License contract list with filter:

  • Contract type = License contract
If Asset model isn't empty and Brand of Asset model isn't empty

Show Publisher list with filter:

  • Owner of Brand of Asset model
Publisher isn't empty and License type isn't empty

Show License model list with filters:

  • Category = false
  • Phase in active
  • Asset type = License
  • Brand is empty, or Publisher is Owner of Brand
  • License type is empty, or License type = License type of License
Publisher is empty and License type isn't empty

Show License model list with filters:

  • Category = false
  • Phase in active
  • Asset type = License
  • License type is empty, or License type = License type of License
Publisher isn't empty and License type is empty

Show License model list with filters:

  • Category = false
  • Phase in active
  • Asset type = License
  • Brand is empty, or Publisher is Owner of Brand
Publisher is empty and License type is empty

Show License model list with filters:

  • Category = false
  • Phase in active
  • Asset type = License
None
  • Show Default maintenance contract list with filter:
    • Contract type = Maintenance
    • Contract = Contract that covers this license
None Show only active cost centers in the Cost center drop-down list
None Show only active cost types in the Cost type drop-down list

After change

Condition Service Management actions
Display label is empty Display label = Asset tag
Unit rights is empty and Quantity isn't empty and Total entitlements is empty Total entitlements = Quantity
Unit rights isn't empty and Quantity is empty and Total entitlements is empty Total entitlements = Unit rights
Unit rights isn't empty and Quantity isn't empty and Total entitlements is empty

After upgrading to version 25.4 from any earlier release, ensure that this rule is removed.
To do so, navigate to Administration > Studio > Processes and Rules from the Mega Menu.
In the drop-down, select License, enable Comparison Mode, then click Edit and remove the rule.
 Total entitlements = Unit rights x Quantity
Unit rights isn't empty and Quantity isn't empty and Total entitlements isn't empty Validate: Total entitlements ≤ 2147483647
Unit rights is empty Set Unit rights to 1
Unit rights is not empty and Quantity isn't empty and Total entitlements is not empty Total entitlements = Unit rights x Quantity
Unit rights is empty and Quantity isn't empty and Total entitlements is not empty Total entitlements = Quantity and Unit rights = 1
Unit rights is not empty and Quantity is empty and Total entitlements is not empty Total entitlements = Unit rights
End date isn't null and First installation date isn't null Validate: End date ≥ First installation date
Total amount isn't null and Currency is null Currency = USD($)
Total amount = null Currency = null
License type is empty and Asset model isn't empty and Asset model is changed License type = License type of Asset model
Default maintenance contract is changed

Maintenance end date to the first value found in the following list:

  • End date of Default maintenance contract
  • Maintenance end date
Publisher is empty and Asset model isn't empty and Brand of Asset model isn't empty Publisher = Owner of Brand of Asset Model
If Model is changed, Total amount of the asset model isn't empty, and Total amount is empty Set Currency to the Currency of the asset model
If Model is changed, Total amount of the asset model isn't empty, and Total amount is empty Set Total amount to the Total amount of the asset model
If Cost center is empty, Owner is changed, and Cost center of the owned-by person isn't empty Cost center = Cost center of the owner
Cost type is empty, Asset model is changed, and Cost type of the asset model isn't empty Cost type = Cost Type of the asset model

After applying change

Condition Service Management actions
Phase ID is changed to Receive Generate expense lines based on the configured cost allocation rules

End phase

In the out-of-the-box license workflow, the rule detailed for the following event applies to the End phase.

After change

Condition Service Management actions
None Close code = mandatory
